scripts.migrate:fresh: docker exec php-fpm php artisan migrate:fresh
scripts.db:seed: docker exec php-fpm php artisan db:seed
scripts.migrate:seed: npm run migrate:fresh && npm run db:seed
scripts.test:playwright: npm run migrate:seed && cd playwright && npx playwright install --with-deps && npx playwright test --retries=0
scripts.test:api:local: npm run migrate:seed && cd playwright && npx playwright install --with-deps && npx playwright test api --project local --retries=0
scripts.test:api:prod: npm run migrate:seed && cd playwright && npx playwright install --with-deps && npx playwright test api --project production --retries=0
scripts.test:e2e:local: npm run migrate:seed && cd playwright && npx playwright install --with-deps && npx playwright test e2e --project local --retries=0
scripts.test:e2e:prod: cd playwright &&  npx playwright install --with-deps && npx playwright test e2e --project production --retries=0
